Subskills.name: Twisted Winds
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of twisters.

Subskills.name: Entangling Gust
Subskills.description: Twisters pierce through targets with increased damage inflicting entangling roots on hit.

Subskills.name: Whispering Winds
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of twisters.

Subskills.name: Wind's Trajectory
Subskills.description: Chance to change trajectory towards nearest monster with increased damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Gust's Bite
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Windstruck
Subskills.description: Chance to strike monsters with lightning on hit dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Ripping Gust
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt inflicting bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Windstep
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using twisters.

Subskills.name: Upward Spiral
Subskills.description: Chance to send monsters airborne dealing increased damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Piercing Winds
Subskills.description: Chance for twisters to become piercing.

Subskills.name: Explosive Gust
Subskills.description: Twisters explode with increased area of effect radius on hit inflicting arcane break.

Subskills.name: Splitting Twister
Subskills.description: Conjure a single twister with increased damage and size unleashing piercing twisters to all directions on hit.
